relnotes.name: XML DOM and XPath
relnotes.purpose: This component contains the XML Document Object Model and XPath API library and the serialisation library.
relnotes.defect: The listed files are now being exported to proper locations.

defect.title: The libxml2 STIFF , NodeFilter-01,test case fails in udeb build.

relnotes.defect: Increased the scope of 'aFilterData' and renamed it to 'filterData' in SaveNodeL function.
Xmldom : Renamed the variable name as j instead of i.

deliverystep.name: Base Services: LibXML2 CoreOS2 transfer

preq.title: XML DOM parser based on libxml2

deliverystep.preq: The Symbian OS XML services subsystem shall be extended with a new DOM API, the open source libxml2 library and a new libxml2-based SAX plug-in for the existing XML Parser Framework.

deliverystep.preq: Relocating Header files for XML API
